physical_appearance: The enlarger timer is black in colour and it has two large adjust buttons, a start button, and a switch to change the modes of the device. At the front of the enlarging timer, the brand 'LPL' and the name of its model, 'Enlarging Timer ET-200', are displayed. It is accompanied with a two-pin black wire. The packaging of the enlarger timer is made of cardboard and it is brown in colour. At the front of the cardboard packaging, the brand 'LPL' and the name of its product, '5553 Enlarging Timer ET-200 LPL Co. Ltd Tokyo-Japan', are displayed. The features of the enlarging timer are stated in three lines of point form
sgcool_label_text: An enlarger timer is used to control how long the exposure will be in photographic film processing. An electronic timer such as this is connected to the enlarger, turning the enlarger lamp on and off automatically. This enlarger timer is part of the darkroom photography equipment that was previously used by The Picture Farm, which was set up by the renowned photographer Willie Tang.
context_21: 45 Jalan Pemimpin, #09-00 Foo Wah Industrial Building, Thomson, Singapore
context_20: The set of equipment was used by The Picture Farm Pte Ltd
subject_terms_2: Photography Equipment and supplies Packaging Automatic timers
